channel.title: The basic leaning of java, i need info please
channel.description: Ok, i am wondering what java is about. How will this inform me? Will it actualy help me code stuff on my server? I just want some information about java and what it will do if i read all of those java coding websites.

item.title: The basic leaning of java, i need info please
item.dc:creator: @maggot525 maggot525
item.description:
@maggot525 wrote:

pkinnubpk:

Ok, i am wondering what java is about. How will this inform me? Will it actualy help me code stuff on my server? I just want some information about java and what it will do if i read all of those java coding websites.

They will give you an understanding of java coding. It will help you know when and where to call voids, why you make arrays, ect. When i first started learning java i bought a book called “the basics of java for dummies”, it was very easy to understand.

Read full topic
item.source: The basic leaning of java, i need info please
